description: Are you ready to enhance your dance abilities and overall fitness? Join our Gymnastics for Dancers & Youngsters program at LVDS and experience a holistic approach to physical development!

title: Kisi Ko Batana Mat Ft. Anubhav Singh Bassi
location: Millers Road, Kaverappa Layout, Vasanth Nagar, Near Bhagwan Mahaveer Jain Hospital
description: After the great success of his previous show "Bas kar bassi," Anubhav Singh Bassi is coming back to perform live on stage. This time, he will bring a whole new set of funny stories and jokes that will keep you entertained. Get ready to enjoy an exciting and hilarious performance that will make you laugh uncontrollably and leave you in high spirits.

title: SHAYAR Sartaaj Live: Bengaluru
venue: Prestige Srihari Khoday Centre For Performing Arts
location: Silver Oak Plantation, 25, Mudalappa St, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunta
description: Sartaaj is on the road most of the time kicking off his creative projects. Currently he is promoting his signing on the Rukus Avenue music label. Don't miss the opportunity to catch up with him on tour.

title: DANIEL SLOSS: CAN’T - India Tour 2024 - Bengaluru
location: WJJC+JP8, 18th Main Rd, John Nagar, Koramangala, Bengaluru,
description: Daniel’s previous ground-breaking, global smash-hits include ‘HUBRiS’ (the world’s biggest solo comedy touring show and 5th biggest ticket selling event for most of 2021 as reported in Pollstar) and ‘X’ (his acclaimed tour de force about sexual assault. ‘X’ toured non-stop for 300 performances over 17 months around the globe, traversing Europe, UK, U.S., Canada, Australia, Hong Kong, Japan and even packing a Moscow arena (becoming Russia’s biggest-ever English language comedy show and creating a sensation with a joke about the importance of sex education – not a taboo subject in Putin’s Russia – an illegal one.). The film of ‘X’ is on HBO in USA, Canada and was the first UK comedy special with a UK premiere in cinemas, following a nationwide release at Vue

title: Sitar For Mental Health
subtitle: HSBC presents ‘SFMH’ - Rishab Rikhiram Sharma
location: Silver Oak Plantation, 25, Mudalappa St, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062
description:
Sitar for Mental Health events are immersive experiences that bridge ancient practices of sound and energy medicine using traditional Indian music, designed to invoke states of deep reflection, receptivity, and introspection.

Sitarist, music producer, and mental health advocate, Rishab Rikhiram Sharma, is made for the spotlight and his multi-faceted career is shaping up to be nothing short of iconic. Rishab presents his massive fourth Pan India SFMH Tour across eleven cities. Bringing awareness towards Mental health by inducing education and experiences of the auditory sensory processing system which Classical music brings forth and re-introduces the sound of the Sitar as a transformational tool.

title: Seedhe Maut - Lunch Break India Tour 2024
subtitle: Still On A Lunch Break!
location: Bengaluru
description:
Catch the 'best in the business' in a city near you! Seedhe Maut are taking their hit mixtape on a massive 12-city pan-India tour. The dynamic duo, known for their explosive live performances, will be playing an extended set and will feature several special guests as well as a few surprises! Get your tickets now! 

Having mastered the art of delivering razor-sharp rhymes - this Delhi-based duo comprising Encore ABJ and Calm has used their lyrical dexterity to push forward the boundaries of Hip-Hop in India. Presenting Hindi Rap in a revolutionary new format, Seedhe Maut is taking the industry by storm and is unanimously regarded as the next big thing to break in the rapidly growing subculture landscape.

Age Restriction: 16+

Bangalore's Biggest #HOLI Festival 2024 is back at SKY GARDEN, WHITEFIELD, and you wouldn't want to be anywhere else on this 'Holi'Day! 
Choose from or be there on all 3 days with 8 hours of Music & FNB.

title: SCC SkyCinema - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: Konanakunte Cross Metro Station, Anjanadri Layout, Konanakunte
description:
"Life mein jitna bhi try karo, kuch na kuch toh chhootega hi. Toh jahaan hai, wahi ka maza lete hai.""- Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Enjoy your favorite movie on a breezy terrace, perched on the rooftop of Forum South Bangalore Mall. Here you'll have an unobstructed view of the night sky, creating a unique and immersive cinema experience as you sink into comfy bean bags or mattresses and watch the movie on a large screen with the skyline of the city as your backdrop.

Screening Schedule: 

16th March, Saturday - Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani

Gates open at 7:00 pm and the movie starts at 7.30 pm.

Seating:

Seating will be allocated on a first-come-first-served basis.

We recommend that you carry warm clothes/blankets for your comfort during the screening.

title: SCC Open Air Cinema - Notting Hill
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: RMZ Eco World Rd, Adarsh Palm Retreat, Bellandur
description:
"I'm just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her. And I think we have a future together." - Notting Hill

Join us for an evening of laughter, love, and unexpected connections as Sunset Cinema Club presents a screening of this timeless classic at Ecodeck.

Located in Bangalore's bustling metropolis, this business hub transforms into a haven of relaxation and entertainment as the sun sets and the stars begin to emerge, as your film screening begins. Enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound, as you sink into comfy bean bags, in the great outdoors.

Screening Schedule:

16th March, Saturday - Notting Hill

Gates open at 7:00 pm and the movie starts at 7.30 pm.

title: SCC Picnic Cinema - Under The Tuscan Sun
subtitle: When the sun goes down the show comes on
location: 82/2, Gantiganahalli
description:
"Unthinkably good things can happen, even late in the game." - Under The Tuscan Sun 

Embark on a journey to the sun-soaked landscapes of Italy as Sunset Cinema Club presents a special screening of the enchanting film, "Under the Tuscan Sun." Join us for an evening of romance, self-discovery, and the picturesque beauty of Tuscan dreams under the open sky at Garden City Beer Collective.

Come for an evening of cinematic delight, as the sun goes down, and the show comes on! Enjoy a picnic-y ambiance, where you can sit or even lie down on comfy bean bags, surrounded by lush green grass! String lights illuminate the area, casting a warm glow that sets the perfect mood for the evening, while you enjoy your favorite film on a large screen with surround sound accompanied by delicious munchies and drinks!

His new hour of jokes is not to be missed!

description:

Event Highlights 
1. Massive Open Ground.
2. Huge Parking Space.
3. Unlimited Colors
4. 8 Hours of Continuous Music
5. Get lost in 8 hours of thrilling music with our lineup of 10 celebrity DJs, including DJ Oppozit, DJ Ashwin, DJ Vijju, DJ Manny, DJ Mavis, DJ Pyrotics, DJ Kash, DJ J&A, and DJ Pillar, with MC Samaira Khan leading the charge!
6. Live Veg/Non-Veg food stall and beverage stalls.
7. Live Dhol
8. A massive bar setup, 
9. A stage that promises to elevate the celebration.

title: Holi Sundowner
subtitle: Celebrity holi bash!

description: A Holi Celebrity Bash which is the first of its kind as a sundowner and colours to play all evening and night keeping the heat aside. Dance the Sundowner Away with live music by DJ Olly Esse, Progressive Brothers, and more Artists. Join us and have the best Holi ever with the best fire and Color show.  Feel the rainbow awaken your spirit with Holi Sundowner, the most vibrant Holi celebration in town.

title: Holi Barsane Wali
subtitle: No Dhaka Shaka – only Pao Ruka!
location: Urban Valley Resort, Vaderahalli Village, Kanakapura Rd, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560082
description:
Holi hai Boss! Let`s get ready and bring your friends/ family to whom you couldn`t meet due to traffic and forget about North South Bangalore. We bring you a perfect resort where you can enjoy Holi in a spacious arena with yummy thandai (authentic Holi beverage ) with pakodas.
Dance on DJ beats with Live Dhol beats. Enjoy the festival of colours with your loved ones.

title: Phoolon Wali Holi Ft. Panjabi MC
subtitle: Experience India`s First Ever Flower Holi Party!
location: 162/2, Main Road, Hennur
description:
Experience the most colorful celebration of Holi with a twist!

Join us at Bangalore`s most vibrant event, Oia presents Phoolon wali Holi, on 24th March, starting at 12 PM.

Featuring Punjabi MC (Fame Mundian To Bach Ke), Vipul Khurana, Dr Prakhar, Santana, and Virat Munjal, immerse yourself in the festivities with live Dhol, a cascade of flowers, delicious food and beverages, and international acts.

Let`s bloom together in a riot of joy and music, where the air is filled with the fragrance of flowers and the spirit of togetherness! 

Every participant will receive a bag of vibrant flowers and colors.

title: Holi High ft. Stebin Ben
subtitle: Prepare for an explosion of colours and music!
location: Palm Meadows, Prestige Ozone, Whitefield Main Road, Whitefield, Devasandra Industrial Estate, Krishnarajapura, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560048
description:
Get set to immerse yourself in a spectacular celebration of music and colours at Phoenix Mall! On 23rd March, mark your calendars for the inaugural "Stebin Ben Live in Concert" event, where the vivacious spirit of Holi converges with the enchantment of live music for an experience like no other.

Taking centre stage is the sensational Stebin Ben, whose infectious energy promises to ignite the crowd and keep you dancing all night long. Join us as we make history and revel in the magic of music, laughter, and unforgettable moments.

Don't miss out on this one-of-a-kind event – secure your tickets now and let's make the inaugural "Stebin Ben Live in Concert" at Phoenix Mall an experience to remember!

title: Shreya Ghoshal, A RED LIVE & KALALUHA Concert
subtitle: By Superhits 93.5 RED FM
location: Bengaluru
description:
Superhits 93.5 RED FM brings Shreya Ghoshal, All hearts tour Bengaluru RED LIVE
in Concert Co-presented by Kalaluha.
Let's experience the magic of Shreya Ghoshal's All Hearts Tour in Namma
Bengaluru. Prepare to be captivated by the mesmerizing blend of Shreya Ghoshal's
soulful voice and magnetic stage presence, accompanied by a talented band that
infuses energy and finesse into every performance.

title: Usha Uthup Live with AIR
subtitle: Usha Uthup's First Live Open-Air Concert
location: Magrath Rd, Ashok Nagar, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560025
description:
Celebrating the timeless music of Usha Uthup, who has captivated audiences worldwide for 55 years and counting. This Concert celebrates Music Diva's 55-year Musical Journey.

The concert marks the 2nd collaboration between Usha Uthup and Bangalore's very own Multi-lingual, Multi-genre band - Alive India Rockstars (AIR), mentored by Supratiek Ghosh - Founder of Alive India & Lead Singer of Iconic Band Aurko 

The Concert Series is Alive India's Fundraiser & Awareness Campaign in support of Sponsoring deserving musicians with Free Food, Shelter, Upskill Training & Sustainable Career under Alive India Music Foundation NGO's MSR (Musicians Social Responsibility)

title: Holi Utsav
subtitle: Champagne Showers and Color Splash

description:

Get ready to Dance in with colours flowing all around you! This Holi at High Ultra Lounge rooftop is surely going to fill your memory with vibrant colours, one that you will remember for a long time!

title: Holi Festival Rang Barse
subtitle: by Glory Resonant
location: No 17 And 17, 1, Race Course Rd, Madhava Nagar, Extension
description:
Get ready to be a part of the most vibrant and exhilarating Holi festival of your life! Our
spectacular event invites you to dive into a world of colors, laughter, and love as we
celebrate the arrival of spring and the victory of good over evil.

This year, we have curated an unparalleled experience that will leave you spellbound
with its array of attractions. Be prepared for a visual spectacle with Unlimited Colors,

Beats of 10 renowned DJs from India, spinning an eclectic mix of Music, Bollywood,
EDM, Hip-hop, and Punjabi beats that will make you dance the night away.

title: Rang Leela 2024
subtitle: Immerse yourself in a whirlwind of color
location: No. 91/4, 102/3, Opp BEL Corporate Office, Hebbal Flyover, Veerannapalya Rd, Manayata Tech Park, Nagavara
description:
Join us for RANG LEELA 2024 - The ultimate Holi celebration at MANPHO CONVENTION CENTRE, Manayata Tech Park Nagavara.

Food stalls and Pop-ups will accompany the live music by our lineup of the city’s top DJs for what is bound to be a great time. Get your family and friends and sway the day away at the biggest Holi Party in town.

Dress code alert: Wearing white will make things all the more special.

Your tickets include one pouch of colour and don`t worry, there will be plenty of colour flying around once the party gets started!
